```{r fig.cap = "Factor analysis of 7 EMA items, revealing two Positive Affect (PA1) and Negative Affect (PA2)."}
items <- csd %>%
  select(c(
    "mood_enthus", "mood_cheerf",
    "mood_strong", "mood_satisfi",
    "mood_lonely", "mood_anxious",
    "mood_guilty")) %>%
  scale(.) %>%
  as.tibble(.) %>%
  mutate_all(funs(residuals(stats::arima(., order = c(1,0,0)))))

correlations <- cor(items, use = "complete.obs")
fa = psych::fa(items,
               nfactors = 2,
               rotate = "oblimin",
               fm = "pa",
               scores = "regression")

psych::fa.diagram(fa, 
                  simple = TRUE, 
                  main = "")
```

```{r fig.cap="34 weeks of mood data, from a single participant"}
ggplot(csd, aes(x = date, y = as.numeric(mood_irritat))) +
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", span = .05, se = FALSE) + 
  geom_point(size = .5, alpha = .5, position = position_jitter(height = .1)) + 
  scale_x_date() + scale_y_continuous(breaks = 1:7) + 
  xlab("Time") + ylab("Mood")
```
